properties.Name: ExperianCompanyFacts
properties.Description: Facts associated with the company that have been identified by Experian.

Columns.Name: ExperianFileNumber
Columns.Description: The unique and persistent number that identifies and tracks the Experian company.

Columns.Name: ProfileTimestamp
Columns.Description: The timestamp of the Experian profile.

Columns.Name: PrimarySicIndustryCode
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of the SIC Industry.

Columns.Name: SalesAmount
Columns.Description: The amount of sales of the business.

Columns.Name: YearsOnFile
Columns.Description: The number of years that the business has been on file.

Columns.Name: NaicsNationalIndustryCode
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a NAICS National Industry Code.

Columns.Name: PublicCompanyIndicator
Columns.Description: indicates whether the company is a publicly traded company.

Columns.Name: StockExchangeName
Columns.Description: The name of the stock exchange.

Columns.Name: BusinessDescription
Columns.Description:
A description of the business.

Ex:
"... Founded in 1911 and headquarters in...is a food service company...operates in 3 segments supplying fresh and frozen foods with related supplies"

Columns.Name: ActiveBusinessIndicator
Columns.Description: Indicates that the business is active.

Columns.Name: ExperianBusinessTypeId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of an Experian business type.

Properties.Description: Facts associated with the company that have been identified by Experian.
